snippet: The ruling coalition formed a new government on Tuesday that gives top posts to an Islamist party but also keeps close allies of King Mohammed VI in powerful positions.
abstract: Ruling coalition in Morocco forms a new government granting top positions to Islamist Justice and Development Party, but also keeps allies of King Mohammed VI in powerful positions.
lead_paragraph: The ruling coalition formed a new government on Tuesday that gives top posts to an Islamist party but also keeps close allies of King Mohammed VI in powerful positions.

headline.main: Morocco: Islamists Get Top Posts in Government
headline.print_headline: Morocco: Islamists Get Top Posts in Government
